id.description: The unique identifier of the document.

fileName.description: The name of the file associated with the document.

extension.description: The extension of the file associated with the document.

uploadDate.description: The date the document was uploaded to the system.

isEsignatureDocument.description: Determines whether or not the document is an e-signature document.

category.description: The category that is associated with the document.

isPublishedToEmployee.description: Determines whether or not the document is available to all employees under a company.
